snippet: A new entertainment complex will replace the Pavilion dance club, a gay landmark in Fire Island Pines that was destroyed in a fire last year.
abstract: A new entertainment complex will replace the Pavilion dance club, a gay landmark in Fire Island Pines that was destroyed in a fire last year.

headline.main: Diller Scofidio + Renfro to Redesign the Pines Pavilion
headline.print_headline: Center to Replace Fire Island Club
